title: LI 8 - Miscellaneous-Banking Board Regulations, Superintendent's Regulations, Supervisory Policies and Procedures
content:
LI 8 - Miscellaneous-Banking Board Regulations, Superintendent's Regulations, Supervisory Policies and Procedures

State Regulations
§ LI 8.1 - Interest payments by a person other than the borrower
§ LI 8.2 - Propriety of "transfer" charge by mortgagee upon change of mortgagor

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
